DOC.brief_summary: Stroke result long-term disability many people , particularly survivor stroke cognitive impairment . However , decrease proportion stroke patient able access receive publicly fund rehabilitation . The investigator show previous study in-person delivery Cognitive Orientation daily Occupational Performance ( CO-OP ) rehabilitation approach promote attainment everyday life goal result improvement functional independence executive function . In small pilot study tele-CO-OP people chronic traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) ( n=3 ) , investigator find delivery method feasible participant satisfy treatment demonstrate clinically significant improvement personally meaningful activity . The investigator investigate feasibility , preliminary efficacy , cost-effectiveness deliver CO-OP online format reduce disability post-stroke . The study design single-blind ( assessor ) , randomize wait-list control trial one-month retention follow-up . All therapy test session deliver online . We hypothesize participant demonstrate improvement everyday activity community participation .
